attributes.action: Change how we are charged on vehicle insurance in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
Why I feel this is better for all drivers in the U.K. I am a working person and I feel why should a working person who is working hard year on year insurance is going up.
We are paying for other people's mistakes so our insurances will increase in the area so I feel that insurance companies should take our driving licence number to insure us so that the bad drivers who make claims should be charged more.
When the driver makes a claim it should go on there licence 

So please help me support this.
attributes.background: I feel that when we insurance vehicles in the U.K. It should be insured by the person driving liecense number and not on the area to where we live in.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
